meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

participants: Members of the Park and Recreation Board
The Woodall Rodgers Park Foundation/Klyde Warren Park

agenda_items.title: Marketing and sponsorship policy
agenda_items.description: Authorize approval of the revised Sponsorship and Marketing Revenue Policy

agenda_items.title: Dallas Water Commons
agenda_items.description: Authorize a development agreement with a term commencing upon execution and shall terminate one year following the completion of the construction of improvements with Dallas Wetlands Foundation

agenda_items.title: Campion Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize a thirty-year Interlocal Cooperation Agreement with one ten-year renewal option, subject to Park Board approval, with the City of Irving for the purpose of construction, maintenance, and operation of a portion of the Campion Trail

agenda_items.title: Bachman Creek Greenbelt
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on February 28, 2024, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of Bachman Creek Greenbelt

agenda_items.title: Pegasus Plaza
agenda_items.description: Authorize abandonment of two easements consisting of Surface Rights and Subsurface Rights located at 1401 Commerce Street

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with Phoenix I Restoration and Construction, Ltd. for the construction of Fair Park Tower Building Rehabilitation

agenda_items.title: Trust for Public Land: Greening Czar Update
Cotton Bowl Stadium Agreement
agenda_items.description: Update on Cotton Bowl Stadium Agreement

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the fourth amendment to extend the Cotton Bowl Stadium Agreement

agenda_items.title: 2024 Bond Program: Update on Priority Project Lists
agenda_items.description: Update on priority project lists for the 2024 Bond Program

agenda_items.title: Director’s Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Closed Session to discuss the evaluation and duties of the Director of the Park and Recreation Department

financial_items.description: Development agreement with Dallas Wetlands Foundation
Increase in construction services contract for Fair Park Tower Building Rehabilitation
Total game fee for Cotton Bowl Stadium Agreement
